meanings: a small amount; a bit; (after a verb or adjective) a bit more
to administer (eye medicine etc) in drops
to light (a fire, a lamp etc); to ignite
to mark with a dot; to check off (on a list)
to mention; to bring up (a topic or person)
to nod (one's head) in agreement; to beckon by moving (one's hand) up and down
